page.title: 16A HEADTEACHER'S DAY PART 1
page.content: JULY 1985 8:10am to 9:00am. Arrive school 8:10,unlock main doors staffroom and office. Check Diary,leave typing for clerical assistant's arrival at 8:30. Go to classroom,prepare day's work for children.Handwriting copy practice on blackboard. 8:30 Deputy Head arrives:discuss with her relevant matters. 8:35 Ensure Assembly materials are ready. 8:40 Children arriving,supervised on playground by cleaner in charge. A mother with a problem to see me. 8:45 Angry parent phones;school bus was early,causing her child to miss it.Can I deal with it? 8:50 School cook requests accurate dinner numbers. 8:55 Staff gather for coffee before doors open at 8:58.
